children.value: As I'm sure you're all aware, there was a fatal shooting at Michigan State University on Monday. It is not the most fun or insightful topic to write a blog about, I know, but there wasn't much else I'd rather have been doing.
After a few days of writing, Iâ€™ve finally managed to capture some of my thoughts and feelings with the best words I have right now. You can read it here:
